original_text: A man in the crowd answered. He said to Jesus, ‘Teacher, I brought my son to you. He is not able to speak because he has a bad spirit.
korean_text: 무리 중의 하나가 대답하되 선생님 말 못하게 귀신 들린 내 아들을 선생님께 데려왔나이다

sentences.original_text: A man in the crowd answered.
sentences.korean_translation: 무리 중에 있는 한 사람이 대답했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I brought my son to you.
He is not able to speak
because he has a bad spirit.'
